item.title: Adriana add a quote by Leonard Cohen
item.description: "There is a crack in everything. That's how the light gets in." -- Leonard Cohen

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Michelle Williams
item.description: "I want to be like water. I want to slip through fingers, but hold up a ship." -- Michelle Williams

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Laura Whitcomb
item.description:
"About the library," he whispered. He took out the pencil stub from his pocket and poised it over the page.
"Will you write like Mr. Blake or like yourself?" I inquired.
He wrote and whispered the words aloud as he did. "I am in the library. It smells like old stuff."
"It smells familiar," I suggested. "It smells like words." Because his left side was to me, I couldn't easily take his hand to write.
"Books are boring," James said as he wrote.
"They line the walls like a thousand leather doorways to be opened into worlds unknown," I offered.
He thought about this and then wrote with a smile, "I hate books." -- Laura Whitcomb

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "Beauty is not in the face; beauty is a light in the heart." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Langston Hughes
item.description: "Hold fast to dreams, For if dreams die Life is a broken-winged bird, That cannot fly." -- Langston Hughes

item.title: Adriana add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality." -- John Lennon

item.title: Adriana add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "As usual, there is a great woman behind every idiot." -- John Lennon

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Kami Garcia
item.description: "I'm just the librarian. I can only give you the books. I can't give you the answers." -- Kami Garcia

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Sarah Ockler
item.description: "Every story is part of a whole, entire life, you know? Happy and sad and tragic and whatever, but an entire life. And books let you know them." -- Sarah Ockler

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "If the moon smiled, she would resemble you. You leave the same impression Of something beautiful, but annihilating." -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description:
"Backward we traveled to reclaim the day Before we fell, like Icarus, undone; All we find are altars in decay And profane words scrawled black across the sun.
--From the poem "Doom of the Exiles", written 16 April 1954" -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "I'm no model lady. A model's just an imitation of the real thing." -- Mae West

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Jorge Luis Borges
item.description: "I have always imagined that Paradise will be a kind of library." -- Jorge Luis Borges

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Jorge Luis Borges
item.description: "Being with you and not being with you is the only way I have to measure time." -- Jorge Luis Borges

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Leah Stewart
item.description: "All at once it strikes me... that all you know of a life is the places where it touches your own... It's strange and diminishing, like looking through a telescope at the stars." -- Leah Stewart

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Leah Stewart
item.description: "....and I'll know that this is what you live for - to hear someone say. "Let's go home," to hear someone you love call your name." -- Leah Stewart

item.title: Adriana add a quote by John Green
item.description: "I'm in love with you, and I know that love is just a shout into the void, and that oblivion is inevitable, and that we're all doomed and that there will come a day when all our labor has been returned to dust, and I know the sun will swallow the only earth we'll ever have, and I am in love with you." -- John Green

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Gayle Forman
item.description: "We are born in a day. We die in one day. We can change in one day. And we can fall in love in one day. Anything can happen in just one day." -- Gayle Forman

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Daisy Whitney
item.description: "Because this is what I believe - that second chances are stronger than secrets. You can let secrets go. But a second chance? You don't let that pass you by." -- Daisy Whitney

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Gayle Forman
item.description: "I'm not sure it's possible to simultaneously love something and keep it safe. Loving someone is such an inherantly dangerous act. And yet, love, that's where safety lives." -- Gayle Forman

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Gayle Forman
item.description: "Love is not something you protect. Itâ€™s something you risk." -- Gayle Forman

item.title: Adriana add a quote by Deb Caletti
item.description: "Because what is more like love than the ocean? You can play in it, drown in it. It can be clear and bright enough to hurt your eyes, or covered in fog; hidden behind a curve of road, and then suddenly there in full glory. Its waves come like breaths, in and out, in and out, body stretched to forever in its possibilities, and yet its heart lies deep, not fully knowable, inconceivably majestic." -- Deb Caletti
